name: Gary R. PETERSON, et ux., petitioners, v. BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.
name_abbreviation: Peterson v. Bank of Am., N.A.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Gary R. PETERSON, et ux., petitioners,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.

opinions.text: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit for further consideration in light of Jesinoski v. Countrywide Home Loans,574 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 790, 190 L.E.2d 650 (2015).

casebody.head_matter:
Gary R. PETERSON, et ux., petitioners,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.
No. 13-1526.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 20, 2015.
Opinion
